name: Dice Pusher
description:
Dice Pusher

Dice Pusher is a short Sokoban-like game where you push dice.

The action is set in the old computer days. You are a hacker and your friend wants you to try controlling a "pusher" in a dice-rolling mechanism used in a nearby new casino.

In Dice Pusher, you control a motor-equipped ball that pushes and rolls dice in a mechanism, and your goal is to roll the dice into holes, but their numbers on top should add up or multiply to result in some other number.

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022.
